job_description:
Technical Skills Required:
·        Very strong in Java and Spring Boot based application development.
·        GUI development experience with HTML5/Angular/NodeJS is a big plus.
·        Experience with Caching solutions and No SQL databases is desirable but not a must.
·        Experience with middle layer messaging services like JMS, MQ, EMS or Kafka.
·        Strong at RDBMS concepts and experience with Oracle, Sybase or MS SQL.
·        Cloud experience with Micro Services and Containerization is a big plus.
·        Test driven development and to adhere with firm’s min development standards.
·        Solid experience with CI/CD tools, Agile Development and Software life cycle.
·        Experience with Unix or Linux scripting.
 Non-Technical Skills Required:
 ·        Understanding of Capital markets is desirable.
·        Experience in working with distributed teams situated globally in different time-zones.
·        Excellent analytical communication and interpersonal skills.
